mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.img_addr, p.product_desc, p.normal_price, p.promote_price, p.priority, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status, p.product_category_id, p.shop_id, pm.product_img_id, pm.img_address, pm.img_desc, pm.create_time, pm.priority as detail_img_priority FROM tb_product as p LEFT JOIN tb_product_img as pm ON p.product_id=pm.product_id WHERE p.product_id=#{productId} ORDER BY pm.priority DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product(product_name, img_addr, product_desc, normal_price, promote_price, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, product_category_id, shop_id) VALUES (#{productName}, #{imgAddr}, #{productDesc}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotePrice}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{productCategory.productCategoryId}, #{shop.shopId})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product SET product_category_id = null WHERE product_category_id = #{productCategoryId}
